_source.text: A Dragoon or Warrior is better AoE wise because if he get´s aggro, the targets don´t move away from he others melees, while THM/Black Mage with aggro from AoE just taking away the mobs from the others by trying to kite the target... and Dragoon can selfheal or stun/slow targets to prevent need beeing healed too much while AoEing - this, just beeing sayed, is better than sleep imo.

3) And the manga trumps all of them, because other than the issue of the birth episode, it handles everything better than both series, and while the anime-ending was quite good, the movie was a complete disappointment to me, and the manga-ending is gearing up to be a LOT better.
